page.title: 09Springfield Activities
page.content: The{Afternoon Club}is held at the village hall on Tuesday and Thursday afternoons. There are 43 members of the club. They play cards, indoor bowling and dominoes. There are trips about twice a year and there are also Whist Drives.{Whist Drives}are held in the village sometimes. People sit at tables for four, playing with a partner at a card game called Whist. The two people with most points move on to the next table. The winner is the person with the highest score. Sometimes in Springfield we have { {Coffee Mornings}for charity. To enter you pay 50p for adults, 25p for children. You can buy coffee and cakes to eat. Sometimes you have stalls selling soft goods and bric-a-brac. This shows Springfield life style.
